attributes.action: Ban all face coverings in public.
attributes.additional_details:
Category Issue explanation
Public safety / policing
Full face coverings make it hard forCCTV, police, and witnesses to identify people involved in crime. obstruct criminal investigation facial recognition
Anti–social intimidation
Democratic transparency
Social trust breakdown
Security in transport / airports
ID verification is inherently compromised in high security settings — airports, courts, banks — if full facial identification is blocked.
Extremism / radicalisation 
Equality before the law
attributes.background: Ban all face coverings in public unless you have a medical condition ( that can be checked by being in your NHS files) if not it's a 10,000 fine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Make face coverings illegal" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749103
